text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's talk podcast.com
daily video vocabulary episode 7 hello
English learners welcome back we have a
new word for you today
blown away or you can say to be blown
away so what does blow the way mean come
let's find out long away to be
completely blown away or to be blown
away okay what do you mean by blown away
well to be blown away means to be
surprised or you can say amazed but in a
positive manner long aways a phrase you
use when you hear things that you never
expected let's listen to a couple of
examples on how to use this phrase in
your daily conversation example 1 Peter
blew me away with his knowledge of
vintage cars example 2 I was blown away
when I heard ROM and Rush me had got
married they have known each other for
less than a month
example three my parents were blown off
when they found I had a tattoo on my
hand
